entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Carman
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
